Specimen Type(s): Digitized surgical pathology slides prepared from FFPE tissue
Methodologies: Internet browser-based image review and annotation
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for FullFocus software for digital pathology image viewing and management from FFPE tissue slides
Indications for Use Summary: Software for viewing and management of digital images of scanned surgical pathology slides from FFPE tissue as an aid for primary diagnosis by pathologists; not intended for frozen sections, cytology, or non-FFPE hematopathology specimens
